description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry Lemonade With Gin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Blueberry Lemonade With Gin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour 30ml gin into each cocktail glass. Add 1 1/2 tbs blueberry syrup into each glass and mix. Top each glass with lemonade. Serve with extra blueberries.
